word: \93This is life eternal,\94 Christ said, \93that they might know thee the only true God, and Jesus Christ, whom thou hast sent.\94 John 17:3. And the prophet Jeremiah declared: \93Let not the wise man glory in his wisdom, neither let the mighty man glory in his might, let not the rich man glory in his riches: but let him that glorieth glory in this, that he understandeth and knoweth me, that I am the Lord which exercise lovingkindness, judgment, and righteousness, in the earth: for in these things I delight, saith the Lord.\94 Jeremiah 9:23, 24. Scarcely can the human mind comprehend the breadth and depth and height of the spiritual attainments of him who gains this knowledge.
